parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Get a vehicle's inventory lock state. Can also be used on a unit's backback (see [[lockInventory]]).

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[lockedInventory]] vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isInventoryLocked = [[lockedInventory]] [[vehicle]] [[player]];</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_isBackpackLocked = [[lockedInventory]] [[backpackContainer]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lockInventory]]
</value></part></template></root>
